tool.name: CG-Pipeline-Prediction

param.name: assembly
param.label: Assembly fasta file
param.help: The contigs from an assembly, in fasta format

validator.message: You must specify a fasta file

param.name: tag
param.label: Locus tag prefix, such as one from NCBI
param.help: A custom set of letters to identify uniquely each gene from any other gene in the world. No underscores allowed.

validator.message: You must specify a tag. If you do not care, use NNN
No spaces or underscores are allowed

param.name: outfile
param.label: Name of your genbank output file

validator.message: You must specify a genbank file
The output file must end with .gb or .gbk

tool.help:
.. class:: infomark
**CGP: run-prediction**
This tool predicts genes in a genome assembly
------
**Input:**
An assembly fasta file with contigs
**Output:**
A genbank file with predicted genes, a fasta file with nucleotide sequences of each gene, and a fasta file of translations for coding genes
.. class:: infomark
**Feedback**: http://sourceforge.net/p/cg-pipeline
